name: Tremors (Rubin)
description:
Long ago, the World was peaceful and safe. Everyone was happy, and everyone spent their years in a safe, but boring place they could call their own. But then, one day, the Tremors came. People would disappear alongside the buildings they once called home, and officials were clueless what to do...

...at least, that is, until someone survived to tell the tale. 

Tremors is a Visual Novel that...I've worked on for a bit, and decided to post today. It's not a completely happy tale, and finished to gain closure on the work that I've done in the past. Downloading this game also provides you with concepts, as well as an unfinished comic that I started back in my Patreon days.

Content Warnings for this game include: Body Horror; depictions of violence (some body horror; at least one physically harming someone); a whole lot of questioning reality and all that jazz. 

My drawings aren't super detailed, but there are some parts that can be unsettling due to the above.
